## colnames/ rownames

```{r}
StuDF2 <- data.frame(
  摮貉??=c(172,214,322,425,517),
  憪??=c("撠??","憭折??","????","撠","憭抒"),
  ??蜀=c(80,60,90,70,50),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
  )
StuDF2 
```

```{r}
colnames(StuDF2)
names(StuDF2)
```

```{r}
colnames(StuDF2) <- c("col1","col2","col3")
colnames(StuDF2)
StuDF2
```

```{r}
colnames(StuDF2)[[2]] <- c("憪??")
colnames(StuDF2)
StuDF2

```
 
```{r}
colnames(StuDF2)[c(2,3)] <- c("name","grade")
colnames(StuDF2)
StuDF2

```

```{r}
a <- c("1","b","TRUE")
a
a[[2]] <- "c" # 元素存在
a[[5]] <- "7" # 元素不存在
a
```
```{r}
b <- list(
  元素1=1,
  元素2="Hello",
  元素3=TRUE
)
b
b[[3]]<-FALSE
b[[5]]<-7
b
```
```{r}
library(readr)
library(lubridate)
exData3 <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/exData3.csv",
                    col_types = cols(
                      匯率 = col_number(),
                      期間 = col_character()))
exData3[[1]]<- ymd(exData3[[1]])
class(exData3[[1]])
```
```{r}
isAsiaCrisis<- exData3[[1]]>= ymd("1997-06-01") & exData3[[1]]<=ymd("1998-12-01") #要把日期轉換為ymd
isAsiaCrisis
```

```{r}
logiAsiaCrisis <- exData3$isAsiaCrisis
exData3[logiAsiaCrisis, ]
```
